title: 3dTORTOISEtoHere
description: Convert standard TORTOISE DTs (diagonal-first format) to standard AFNI (lower triangular, row-wise) format.

output_dt_file.title: Output DT file
output_dt_file.description: Output AFNI-style DT file with the following ordering of the 6 bricks: Dxx, Dxy, Dyy, Dxz, Dyz, Dzz.
